DOC.detailed_description: This open , prospective , multi-center clinical trial evaluate On1 Concept treatment patient need single tooth replacement 3-unit bridge mandible maxilla .
DOC.criteria: The subject least 18 year age ( age consent ) pass cessation growth . Obtained informed consent subject . The patient willing able comply study related procedure ( exercise oral hygiene attend followup procedure ) . The subject shall healthy compliant good oral hygiene . Fullmouth bleed score ( FMBS ) low 25 % [ 10 ] . Fullmouth plaque score ( FMPI ) low 20 % [ 11 ] . Suitable implant treatment posterior , premolar canine area mandible maxilla . The subject shall favorable stable occlusal relationship . In need one multiple single tooth replacement 3unit bridge . Healed site need implant placement ( i.e . minimum 6 week post extraction ) . The implant site free infection extraction remnant . The subject suitable 1stage surgical procedure . Sufficient amount buccal lingual keratinize mucosa . The subject sufficient amount bone place NobelActive implant length least 8 mm . Primary implant stability assess manual hand test . The subject able give her/his inform consent participate . Health condition , permit surgical ( include anesthesia ) restorative procedure . Reason believe treatment might negative effect subject 's overall situation ( psychiatric problem ) , note subject record subject history . Any disorder plan implant area previous tumor , chronic bone disease previous irradiation head/neck area . Infections plan implantation site adjacent tissue . Acute , untreated periodontitis plan implantation site adjacent tissue . Any ongoing application interfere medication ( steroid therapy , bisphosphonate , etc. ) . Uncontrolled diabetes , i.e . subject diagnose diabetes history neglect doctor 's recommendation regard treatment , food alcohol intake A1c level 8 % . Alcohol drug abuse note subject record subject history . Smoking > 10 cigarettes/day . Fresh extraction site ( 6 week ) . Severe bruxism destructive habit . Pregnant lactate woman time implant insertion . Previous bone augmentation ( lateral and/or vertical ) . Soft tissue augmentation le 2 month implant placement .
